ar: لَّقَدْ كَانَ لَكُمْ فِى رَسُولِ ٱللَّهِ
en: There has certainly been for you in the Messenger of Allah

ar: لِّمَن كَانَ يَرْجُوا ٱللَّهَ وَٱلْيَوْمَ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَ
en: for anyone whose hope is in Allah and the Last Day
And when the believers saw the companies,
"This is what Allah and His Messenger had promised us,
and Allah and His Messenger spoke the truth."
And it increased them only in faith and acceptance.
true to what they promised Allah.
Among them is he who has fulfilled his vow [to the death],
and among them is he who awaits [his chance].
And they did not alter [the terms of their commitment] by any alteration -
That Allah may reward the truthful for their truth
and punish the hypocrites if He wills
Indeed, Allah is ever Forgiving and Merciful.
